summary: TechStart Solutions is currently onboarding 20-30 new customers per week, with each onboarding taking 2-3 hours of manual work including account setup, welcome emails, CRM updates, and documentation. We'll build an intelligent automation system that handles the entire onboarding process, reducing manual work by 90% while improving consistency and customer experience.

deliverables.desc: Instantly create user accounts with appropriate permissions based on customer tier (Basic, Pro, Enterprise). Connects to your authentication system and assigns resources automatically.
Personalized 7-day onboarding email series triggered by customer actions and milestones. Adapts based on product usage and engagement levels.
Seamless two-way sync between your onboarding system and HubSpot. Automatically creates deals, updates contact properties, and logs all onboarding activities.
Visual dashboard showing onboarding pipeline, completion rates, bottlenecks, and time-to-value metrics. Updates in real-time as customers progress.
Generates and sends custom onboarding guides, training materials, and resource links based on customer industry and use case.

additional_notes: Includes 30 days of post-launch support, comprehensive documentation, and team training session. Optional ongoing maintenance available at $350/month.
